data.title: CADENCE DESIGN SYSTEMS
data.meta_description: Cadence is a pivotal leader in electronic design, building upon more than 30 years of computational software expertise. The company applies its underlying
data.text:
Cadence is a pivotal leader in electronic design, building upon more than 30 years of computational software expertise. The company applies its underlying Intelligent System Design strategy to deliver software, hardware and IP that turn design concepts into reality.

Cadence customers are the world’s most innovative companies, delivering extraordinary electronic products from chips to boards to systems for the most dynamic market applications including consumer, hyperscale computing, 5G communications, automotive, aerospace, industrial and health.

Cadence and Dassault Systèmes partnering creates a differentiating solution.

Connecting the entire Concept to Manufacturing value chain for companies creating innovative products requiring 3D Mechanical design, Semiconductor design, IC Package development and PCB Design, Cadence brings a leadership position in electronic design and simulation, the partnership will allow immersive flow of information, driving customer efficiency and innovation.

Cadence will develop high value integrations to enable collaboration inside the 3DEXPERIENCE platform for information such as Design Data and Intent, collaborative Bill of Materials, visibility from electronic design into the enterprise, and access from the enterprise into the Cadence design ecosystem.
